title: Ontario's English Catholic teachers reach deal with province - Toronto Sun
description: Ontario's English Catholic teachers reach deal with province Toronto Sun Ontario Catholic teachers reach tentative deal with province CBC.ca Catholic teachers reach tentative agreement with Ontario government CTV News Ontario English Catholic Teachers Associa…
content: One down three to go Late Thursday afternoon Ontario Education Minister Stephen Lecce confirmed a tentative agreement has been reached with the Ontario English Catholic Teachers Association OECTA one of four teachers unions involved in ongoing contrac chars
